problem.title:
You Invested in an E-Ink Tablet.
But Is It Really Working for You?
problem.card_1_desc: You open your tablet and stare at an empty screen, unsure where to start.
problem.card_2_desc: Creating templates from scratch takes forever. By the time you finish, your motivation is gone.
problem.card_3_desc: Firmware updates break your carefully organized notebooks. You're back to square one.
problem.card_4_desc: Without structure, your notes become a disorganized mess that's impossible to navigate.
problem.card_5_desc: You bought the tablet to be more productive, but you're still struggling with the same problems.
problem.card_6_desc: The learning curve is steep. You're spending more time figuring out the tool than using it.
problem.solution_title: What If Your Tablet Came Pre-Loaded With Everything You Need?
problem.solution_desc: Imagine opening your tablet to find professionally designed planners, trackers, and notebooks ready to use. No setup. No frustration. Just pure productivity from day one.

footer_closure.title: Your Purchase is Protected
footer_closure.subtitle: We stand behind our products with these guarantees
footer_closure.guarantee_1_desc: 256-bit SSL encryption. Powered by Stripe & PayPal.
footer_closure.guarantee_2_desc: Get your templates immediately after purchase. Download anytime.
footer_closure.guarantee_3_desc: New templates and improvements? You get them free. Forever.
footer_closure.faq_subtitle: Everything you need to know before you buy
footer_closure.faq_1_question: Will these templates work on my device?
footer_closure.faq_1_answer: Yes! Our templates are in industry-standard PDF format and work on ALL major e-ink tablets including reMarkable 2, Paper Pro, Supernote, Boox, Kindle Scribe, Kobo, and even iPad apps like GoodNotes and Notability.
footer_closure.faq_2_question: How do I transfer the templates to my device?
footer_closure.faq_2_answer: After purchase, you'll receive an instant download link. Simply download the PDF files and transfer them to your device via USB, cloud sync, or email. Each device has different methods - we include step-by-step instructions for all major devices.
footer_closure.faq_3_question: What's included in the Ultimate Collection?
footer_closure.faq_3_answer: You get 200+ premium templates across 10 categories: Daily Planners, Goal Trackers, Project Management, Finance Tools, Study Templates, Creative Spaces, Travel Journals, Wellness Logs, plus 500+ bonus stickers, 22 notebook covers, and our Mental Models guide.
footer_closure.faq_4_answer: Absolutely! When we release new templates or improvements, you get them free. No subscription fees, no expiration dates. One purchase = lifetime access to all current and future templates.
footer_closure.faq_5_question: How quickly will I receive my templates?
footer_closure.faq_5_answer: Instantly! After purchase, you'll receive an email with your download link within 2 minutes. No waiting, no shipping. You can start using your templates immediately.
footer_closure.faq_6_question: What if I have questions after purchase?
footer_closure.faq_6_answer: We offer priority email support with response times under 24 hours. Plus, we include detailed setup guides and video tutorials. If you ever need help, we're here for you.
footer_closure.faq_7_question: Can I use these templates commercially?
footer_closure.faq_7_answer: Yes! You can use our templates for personal or commercial purposes. This includes using them for client work, business planning, content creation, and more. The only restriction is reselling or redistributing the template files themselves.
footer_closure.faq_8_answer: Due to the digital nature of our products, we generally don't offer refunds. However, if you experience any technical issues, we'll work with you to resolve them. Contact us if you have any concerns before purchasing.
footer_closure.final_cta_title: Ready to Transform Your E-Ink Experience?
footer_closure.final_cta_desc: Join 12,000+ customers who have already upgraded their productivity. One-time purchase, lifetime access.
